QuestData.Title: Be Our Guest
QuestData.Description: My dear friend $n, I do hope you enjoy the festival. I throw it every year to bring riders from all over Kul Tiras together for a grand celebration of the sport!$b$bIn fact, you deserve the whole nine yards. Please, tour the estate at your leisure and partake in the delicious food and drink, introduce yourself to the people. I insist!
QuestData.LogDescription: Tour the estate and partake in the festivities.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you taken your tour yet? Take a break from adventuring and relax!
QuestData.RewardText: How are you enjoying the grounds? We are still setting up, so it will be even more marvelous soon!$b$bTo tell you the truth, I have to one-up myself every year. It's quite exhausting organizing it all, but it's so very rewarding!
